entries.meaning: (US) A sharp tool used for digging the edible portion out of a nut.

description: Blend of nut +‎ nitpick; see nut (“crazy person”). Coined by  a commenter in 2006 and popularized by Kevin Drum.

verbs.description: nutpick (third-person singular simple present nutpicks, present participle nutpicking, simple past and past participle nutpicked)

entries.meaning: (Internet) To cherry-pick poor representatives of a viewpoint (i.e., from Internet postings) in order to disparage it.
